messages.content: I rarely get full manic. Lithium just took away my mixed irritable angry episodes and I'm pretty sure those aren't superpowers lol
I have worked at a shitty, south side smoke shop before so I can imagine all of these interactions perfectly hahahaha
You played torb....... that’s why. Just kidding that’s really weird though
Funny part is There ISNT a wall (but maybe should be) and there ARE already plenty of "Sensible" Gun laws
I'm more saying that I think the south is a joke.
Haha I didnt even notice. I guess it does.
I think that had to do more with not wanting to hurt the old man lol
Lol.... i guess your personal experience explains everything.... personally I've seen this play out numerous times in the work place..... so.....
It’s funny because this is the summary of most discussion posts on this sub
Yeah, it's pretty funny how incapable most of them are of actual satire and subtlety.
Oh well maybe your cousin gave his account info to someone lol.
Your name needs some work LOL
i did, but it was at 3 am before i went to bed, so i’m gonna cheat and count it as 2018 LOL.
> one of the better diss tracks out there Lol okay
Concas! In vic park. Been closed down multiple times for health and safety violations lol
Look... they are pretending it never happened. Lol.
His entire face is covered by a beard and sunglasses lol
hahah if only he had reddit

I said this somewhere else.. but I swear that man in the hood is caucasian... But that was actually hilarious
Red, Green, Blue. It's like a Christmas tree Edit: lol
well we all know what a complex meal sandwiches are! hahaha
